title: Revenue Trend
query: SELECT t AS time, (100000 + 20000*sin(extract(epoch from t)/86400*2*pi()) + (random()*5000))::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 day') AS t

title: Active Users
query: SELECT t AS time, (500 + 200*sin(extract(epoch from t)/3600) + random()*50)::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 hour') AS t

title: Conversion Rate %
query: SELECT t AS time, (50 + 20*sin(extract(epoch from t)/86400*2*pi()))::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 day') AS t

title: Orders by Region
query: SELECT label, value FROM (VALUES ('North', 1200), ('South', 950), ('East', 1300), ('West', 800)) AS x(label, value)

title: Top Products
query: SELECT label, value FROM (VALUES ('Pro', 420), ('Plus', 310), ('Basic', 190)) AS x(label, value)

title: Avg Session Duration (s)
query: SELECT t AS time, (60 + 20*sin(extract(epoch from t)/3600) + random()*5)::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 hour') AS t

title: Bounce Rate %
query: SELECT t AS time, (35 + 10*sin(extract(epoch from t)/86400*2*pi()))::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 day') AS t

title: New Signups
query: SELECT t AS time, (200 + 80*sin(extract(epoch from t)/86400*2*pi()) + random()*20)::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 day') AS t

title: Support Tickets
query: SELECT t AS time, (50 + 30*sin(extract(epoch from t)/43200*2*pi()) + random()*10)::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '30 minutes') AS t

title: Marketing Spend
query: SELECT t AS time, (20000 + 5000*sin(extract(epoch from t)/604800*2*pi()) + random()*1000)::numeric AS value FROM generate_series($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), interval '1 day') AS t
